title: India Champions Vs Australia Champions | Ind Vs Aus WCL Highlights: India Go Down Fighting By 4 Wickets
description: India Champions vs Australia Champions, WCL 2025 Highlights: India Champions lost a second match in a row after going down by four wickets against Australia
excerpt: India Champions vs Australia Champions, WCL 2025 Highlights: India Champions lost a second match in a row after going down by four wickets against Australia
text: India Champions vs Australia Champions, WCL 2025 Highlights© X (Twitter) India Champions vs Australia Champions, WCL 2025 Highlights: India Champions lost second match in a row after going down by four wickets against Australia. Despite, Piyush Chawla's three-wicket haul Australia reached the 204-run target with one ball to spare. Callum Ferguson was Australia Champions' hero with a 38-ball 70*. past 150-mark in a 204 run chase. Now, Australia are 6 down. Earlier, Shikhar Dhawan slammed 91* while Yusuf Pathan scored 52* to help India score 203/4 in 20 overs. In India's first match of the Tournament, India suffered a massive 88-run defeat against the Proteas after AB de Villiers fought against his age and played a 30-ball 63-run knock. html:
India Champions vs Australia Champions, WCL 2025 Highlights© X (Twitter)

India Champions vs Australia Champions, WCL 2025 Highlights: India Champions lost second match in a row after going down by four wickets against Australia. Despite, Piyush Chawla's three-wicket haul Australia reached the 204-run target with one ball to spare. Callum Ferguson was Australia Champions' hero with a 38-ball 70*. past 150-mark in a 204 run chase. Now, Australia are 6 down. Earlier, Shikhar Dhawan slammed 91* while Yusuf Pathan scored 52* to help India score 203/4 in 20 overs. In India's first match of the Tournament, India suffered a massive 88-run defeat against the Proteas after AB de Villiers fought against his age and played a 30-ball 63-run knock. (Scorecard)
